subject: re:Must have medications
body:
Dear customer.
It's not a secret that there are lots of online pharmacies that cheat their clients by selling fake drugs in order to make extra profits. We don't. 
Can generic drugs be cheap? Sure, but only if they come from Canada. CanadianPharmacy offers you to save large without having to put your health in danger. Huge choice of qualitative generic drugs offered at the lowest prices imaginable only at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy save money on high-quality generic medications from Canada here.
Yours,Meredith Henry
